item.title: The Office Gurl: A Feminization Fiction and Transgender Romance
item.dc:creator: admin

Growing up being bullied ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $2.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:37:43 UTC – Details)


“Underneath her pencil skirt and silk blouse, distracting all the yearning men in the conference room with her apparition, she knew exactly who to give her attention to for her next career opportunity.”

Life seemed to be a constant struggle for 29-year-old Chicago native Aaron Abrams. Growing up being bullied in school for being a femboy, having a dysfunctional relationship with his father, and as the cherry on top, being fired from work for the fifth time.

All he had to his name were a fine arts degree that got him nowhere and his transgender best friend Michelle. Done with being a failure, he spun the wheel of fortune with her help… taking everything and everyone he deemed he deserved.

Aaron, who’s now Amanda, is basking in the perks of her genuine self. Wielding her newfound feminine power, she elevates to the top of the corporate ladder through corruption and exploiting men’s deepest desires.

Clutch your Pearl Necklace Tight and Prepare for a Transgender Romance and Feminization Ride!
Note: This title contains transgender romance, straight transgender, trans lesbian, drama, and transgender transformation tropes.

From the Publisher

Prima Femina Romances Series

Three Original Feminization Romances From The Heart

Prima Femina Romances is Lilly Lustwood’s first Feminization Romance and Transgender Romance in one series. It encapsulates romantically feminized protagonists with transgender lesbian lovers.

Sissification and Crossdressing Selections

Modeling for Mrs. Morningwood

His life started to get more exciting when the Morningwoods moved to Alburtis where he lives. That pivotal moment was the beginning of how exciting it was to elevate his sensitivity to women’s feelings into a lifestyle that he never imagined he’d experience as… Mrs. Morningwood’s Muse Just what will Danny discover about his dream girl Mrs. Morningwood? Will he be able to swallow the hard truth?

Tokyo Sissy Hostess Part One

Tired of his upper-class family’s nagging about taking over the family business and being called a disappointment, he was determined to escape. Just how far would he go to be financially free? What was he willing to give up for his dominant Japanese mama-san who was keeping something insatiable between her legs? Discover how Louie swallowed his Pride, Ego, Masculinity, and more *wink*, in this Tale of Feminization.

The Fifth Wife Part One

Love conquers all. It breaks the boundaries of socioeconomic status, politics, and religion. Meet Ahmed Al-Haziz, a 43-year-old tech magnate and CEO who comes from a family of sheiks in Dubai. Extremely handsome, extremely rich, and extremely powerful. Enter Amanda Cruz, a 32-year-old go-getter transgender woman from the Philippines who couldn’t care less about his status, ego, and charms.

Stacey the High School Sissy

Stanley Wetthole AKA Stacey, will stop at nothing to achieve her dreams of transitioning to a transgender bombshell and living the lap of luxury. At the tender age of eighteen, the gorgeous feminine boy has already flawlessly mastered wielding the powers of seduction and beauty. She isn’t like any other sissy. She is cunning, manipulative, and knows how to play her cards right. Vicious and criminally sexy, that’s how they describe Stacey.

Lilly Lustwood the Author

What’s New?

Stefano, the only surviving castrato in the world was suffering from the psychological repercussions of his father’s obsession with the opera.

After eleven years of recovering from his father’s preservation of his vocal range through surgery, he needed to reintegrate himself into the world to make a living.

Will Stefano survive a life that entails more than a switch from being a tenor to being the soprano Prima Donna just like how he was able to survive his father’s obsession?

Feminization Drama and Spice Transgender Lover Transgender Lesbian Transgender Romance

Welcome to Lilly’s World of Love

Transgender and Sissy Romances written by a Transgender Woman

Lilly Lustwood is an Asian transgender author who writes feminization and transgender romance from her real and raw memoirs.

My Cherry No More – A Transgender Romance Memoir Romantic Sissies Volume One Prima Femina Romances Sissy Fairy Tales Volume One Reluctant Feminization Shorts

Sissy Fairy Tales

Sissyrella

Sean Rowland, a 19-year-old art student was still mourning the death of his father from “accidentally drowning” when his evil stepbrothers and transgender stepmother from hell forced him to succumb to a life of servitude and gave him a new identity as Sissyrella. Being an introvert who kept to himself through a life of video games, he had no friends and family to run to. Cleaning, cooking, and servicing his stepfamily was his new normal up until a Sissy Godmother appeared and magically turned his loveless life into a titillating fairy tale.

Sissy White and The Seven Dwarfs

Hair as black as ebony, lips as red as blood, and skin as white as snow were all the markings of Sissy White’s exaltation.

Enter Ingrid, her ornery stepmother and the evil queen who had the magic to morph her own genitalia, stopped at nothing to reclaim the title of being the fairest of them all. Unwilling to listen to one more praise about Sissy White’s beauty from her magic mirror, she ordered the death of the young lady. On All Hallows Eve, the same night the queen has chosen for Sissy White’s demise, the princess was forced to run from the harrowing threat.

The Sissy Mermaid

Cordelia, the most beautiful mermaid deep in the Pacific Ocean, falls in love with a human for the very first time. She yearned for his warm touch and to feel what it was like to get close, but she needed a pair of legs to take the first step in turning her dream into reality. On All Hallows Eve, she consulted a merlock who lived in the most isolated burrows of the ocean floor and asked for a wish. He promised to grant her request with many conditions, two of them being human with something between her legs… and one of them that would cost her life…

Lilly Lustwoood’s Collections

My Cherry No More Collection

My Cherry No More is a coming-of-age and intimate telling of Lilly Lustwood’s first transgender romance experience.

This collection contains three steamy short transgender romance novels of Real and Raw Experiences from her Memoirs.

Romantic Sissies Volume One

Romantic Sissies Volume One is Lilly Lustwood’s Sissification Story and Crossdressing Fiction Selections Books One to Six Collection. It encapsulates three transgender romance stories of three sissies’ first time feminization, reluctant feminization, and sissy husband experiences with three domineering transgender women.

Sissy Fairy Tales Volume One

Sissy Fairy Tales Volume One is Lilly Lustwood’s Dark Romance Books One to Three Collection.

It encapsulates three transgender romance and MM stories of three sissies’ reluctant feminization experiences with domineering transgender women and romantic gentlemen.

Sissy Short Stories

The Short Feminization Fiction Selections series is filled with Lilly Lustwood’s light yet spicy sissy femininedom books and reluctant feminization by domineering transgender and cisgender women.
